subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Stephon Marbury who missed all six of his shots and became an afterthought for the Knicks against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday night is not the player he says he can be.
snippet: The Stephon Marbury who missed all six of his shots and became an afterthought for the Knicks against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday night is not the player he says he can be.
